name: Bmx Fidget Racing - Bike Race
description:
Download Fidget Bmx Racing Now!!!

Relax and relieve stress by spinning the fidget spinner while racing Bmx!!!

Do you have what it takes to survive the wide variety of terrain including forests, cities, oil refineries and the ultimate test that is living hell!

Simple to pick-up-and-play with plenty of depth to keep the entertained for hours.

Features:

-Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking behavior to the bike and rider.

-Unique and smooth gameplay

- Addictive , exciting and hard levels

-Accelerometer support

-Earn stars for your best local times.
